safaris.title: Maasai Mara Safari
safaris.description: A classic short safari covering Kenya's most famous reserve.

days.title: Arrival & First Game Drive
days.description: Transfer from Nairobi Hotel to Wilson Airport for a 45-minute flight to Masai Mara. Arrival transfer to camp for lunch. Afternoon game drive with expert guide.

days.title: Full Day Game Viewing
days.description: Early morning game viewing followed by breakfast. Morning game drive. Lunch then siesta. Afternoon game drive.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Early game viewing then transfer to airstrip for flight back to Nairobi and hotel transfer.

safaris.title: AMBOSELI - LAKE NAIVASHA - NAKURU- MAASAI MARA SAFARI
safaris.description: A 6-day safari covering Amboseli, Lake Naivasha, Lake Nakuru, and Maasai Mara National Reserves. Full board at Sentrim/ Kibo / Kilimanjaro amboseli and Pelican/ Sentrim Naivasha and Senrim/ Ol Moran / Mara leisure in Mara.

days.title: Amboseli Game Reserve
days.description: Drive south through Maasai country to Amboseli Game Reserve arriving at the lodge in the time for lunch. Afternoon game view beneath the snow capped peak of Mount Kilimanjaro. Dinner and overnight at a Safari lodge

days.title: Amboseli Game Reserve
days.description: Dawn drive, returning to the lodge for breakfast. Rest for the morning at the leisure or by the swimming pool. Lunch and a fine game viewing drive in the late afternoon. Dinner and overnight at a Safari Lodge.

days.title: Lake Naivasha
days.description: Early breakfast and proceed to Lake Naivasha with lunch enroute. Afternoon at leisure or by thelake or free for optional excursions. Dinner and overnight at Lake Naivasha Hotel.

days.title: Maasai Mara Game Reserve
days.description: Depart for Maasai Mara Game Reserve after an early breakfast. Lunch at the lodge an afternoon game viewing drive in the reserve the borders the Serengeti Park in Tanzania. Dinner and overnight at a lodge or tented camp.

days.title: Maasai Mara Game Reserve
days.description: Morning and afternoon game viewing in the reserve, noted for it's black maned lion and leopard. Dinner and overnight at a lodge or tented camp.

days.title: NAIROBI
days.description: After an early breakfast depart Maasai Mara and drive to Nairobi arriving in the evening.

safaris.title: LAKE NAKURU - LAKE NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA SAFARI
safaris.description: A 4-day safari covering Lake Nakuru, Lake Naivasha, and Maasai Mara National Reserves. Full board at Sentrim/ Kibo / Kilimanjaro amboseli and Pelican/ Sentrim Naivasha and Senrim/ Ol Moran / Mara leisure in Mara. Accommodations at Sentrim / Pelican Nakuru or Ol moran /Sentrim/ Mara Leisure in Mara

days.title: Lake Nakuru National Park
days.description: Drive through lush tea and coffee plantations near Limuru.  Descend into the Great Rift Valley arriving at the famous bird sanctuary of Lake Nakuru Park.  Afternoon game drive, before proceeding to your lodge for the night (160 kms, 3 hrs).

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Early morning drive past the extinct volcano of Mt. Longonot.  Arrive at the famous Maasai Mara for afternoon game drive and overnight (315 kms, 5 hrs).

days.title: Maasai Mara Game Reserve
days.description: Enjoy a day of uninterrupted game drive in this popular reserve renowned for its huge numbers of plains game such as wildebeest and zebra, and its majestic predators.

days.title: NAIROBI
days.description: Bid farewell to the Mara as you return to Nairobi before lunch (280 kms, 4 1/2 hrs).

safaris.title: Tsavo East & West - Amboseli National Park
safaris.description: A 3-day safari covering Tsavo East & West and Amboseli National Parks.

days.title: TSAVO EAST & WEST NATIONAL PARK
days.description: Drive 100 Kms east to Tsavo east/ West  Park, home to the Red Elephant. Viewing game enroute to Ngulia / Kilaguni/ Sentrim  for lunch, dinner and overnight. Afternoon game drive. ( 165 Kms )

days.title: AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK
days.description: Proceed to Amboseli Park arriving in time for lunch at Kibo/ Sentrim/Serena. Afternoon game drives in this swampy park with Natural Springs which attract wildlife. We have chances to see the snow capped top of Mt Kilimanjaro and also the  Plains animals. Dinner and overnight at the Lodge, (240 Kms ).Accommodation at Kibo or sentrim Amboseli.

days.title: MOMBASA
days.description: Early morning game drives before Breakfast. After breakfast drive back to Mombasa.

safaris.title: AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK SAFARI
safaris.description: A 2-day safari to Amboseli National Park, known for its large elephant herds and stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

days.title: Amboseli National Park
days.description: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms 4hrs]

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop for the wildlife. After breakfast return to Nairobi.

safaris.title: Lake Nakuru National Park
safaris.description: The great Rift Valley stretches from Ethiopia across Kenya to Tanzania. I chain of eight lakes, Lake Nakuru being one of the most famous The Lake is only a few kilometers away from Nakuru, Kenya's 3d largest town 160 km west of Nairobi. you will descend the escarpment into the dramatic landscape of the scenic Rift. You will be treated to an extensive tour of the park, with lunch being served in the park. The tour will focus on the bewildering spectacle of a million flamingos and the variety of wildlife with which the park abounds. Here, you will be treated o a melody of songs from a wide variety of birds. Drive back to Nairobi.

safaris.title: Lake Naivasha and Crescent Island
safaris.description: Your drive takes you down the escarpment and along the floor of the Rift Valley to the Lake Naivasha. Here successful vineyards produce much of Kenya’s wine, have been established. After a guided tour, a buffet lunch consisting of local produce and wine beside the lake, a two hour boat ride takes you to a nearby island where you walk amongst the plains game and enjoy the bird life. Return to Nairobi after tea arriving in the early evening.

safaris.title: MT. Kenya Hiking: SIRIMON OUT CHOGORIA ROUTE
safaris.description: A 5-day hiking adventure on Mount Kenya via the Sirimon and Chogoria routes.

days.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
days.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and later depart and drive North to Naromoru town and transferred to Mountain rock Hotel or Equivalent for dinner and overnight.

days.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES
days.description: Depart Nairobi or your base hotel and drive to sirimon park gate 2600 m and after park formalities hike to Judmeirs camp 3300m 3-4 hrs.

days.title: OLD MOSES - SHIPTONS CAMP
days.description: After breakfast hike to shiptons camp 4200m, the day is a bit long so we need a slow pace. Lunch en route, dinner/overnight at camp. 6 -7hrs.

days.title: SHIPTONS CAMP
days.description: Stay at Shiptons Camp for another night to acclimatize and arrest day. This makes the summit day much more enjoyable. Dinner and overnight at Shiptons Camp.

days.title: SUMMIT DAY - MERU BANDAS
days.description: Attempt point Lenana 4985m then down to hallstarn ( mintos ) for b/fast and go down to Meru Bandas. Lunch en route  dinner and overnight at the lodge. 8-9  hrs

days.title: MERU BANDAS - NAIROBI
days.description: After breakfast we hike down through dense bamboo and rain forest for 6 hrs to meet with our vehicle for transfer to chogoria town for lunch then proceed to Nairobi arriving in the evening. Later transferred to the Airport for your outbound flight.

safaris.title: MOUNT KENYA HIKING: SIRIMON ROUTE
safaris.description: A 4-day hiking adventure on Mount Kenya via the Sirimon route.

days.title: NAIROBI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES
days.description: Depart Nairobi 7.00 am  for Sirimon Park Gate. After park formalities trek for 9 KM (3-4) hours, 690 metres ascend to Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: OLD MOSES - SHIPTONS CAMP
days.description: Trek 14 KM about 6-7 hours 890 metres ascend to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: SUMMIT DAY
days.description: Trek 3-5 hours 755 Metres ascend to Point Lenana arriving  early  in the morning to witness the sunrise. Trek back to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: OLD MOSES - NAIROBI
days.description: After breakfast descend further down to Sirimon Park Gate where you are transferred to Nairobi arriving in the evening.

safaris.title: White water Rafting and Kayaking
safaris.description: A 3-day adventure combining white water rafting and kayaking on the Tana River.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: Depart Nairobi to central Kenya at the slopes of Mt Kenya to Sagana town, the headquarters of water rafting in Kenya at The Tana River. Arrive in time for lunch. Afternoon rafting this biggest river in Kenya. Dinner and overnight at Savage Camp.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: Depart Nairobi to central Kenya at the slopes of Mt Kenya to Sagana town, the headquarters of water rafting in Kenya at The Tana River. Arrive in time for lunch. Afternoon rafting this biggest river in Kenya. Dinner and overnight at Savage Camp.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: In the morning proceed for Mt Biking between 20 km – 40 kms. In the afternoon, engage in a stand-up paddle board for 2 hrs. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

safaris.title: Shimoni, Kisite, Wasini and Chale Islands
safaris.description: These islands are tucked away off the tourist beat and offer secluded resorts. Shimoni is the famous haunt for Diving and deep sea big-game fishing. The Shimoni caves were an old slave town, the Kisite Marine National Park consists of 4 reef islets hosting colorful sea life, and Wasini Island is an old Arab village renowned for its historical monuments and tombs.

description.intro: This is the oldest Kenyan city and one of the earliest Arab settlements along the coast, Lamu has preserved its architecture and a tempo reminiscent of the 18th century. The ambience is maintained by the absence of motor vehicles. Donkeys and dhows are still the common mode of transport. Skilled Lamu craftsmen create ornate doors and Arab chests which contribute to Lamu’s unique identity.

items.title: Lamu Fort
items.content: Built between 1813 and 1821 in the southern corner of the old stone town. The fort is a massive multi-storey building with a central courtyard which has become an image of the Lamu community.

items.title: Lamu Museum
items.content: Originally used by the British colonial government. It houses collections of ethnographic materials from the Swahili, Orma and Pokomo ethnic groups.

items.title: Kiunga Marine Park
items.content: Also known as the ‘Enchanted underwater world’, comprising offshore islands and coral reefs along the Lamu Archipelago.

categories.title: Kenya Excursions
categories.description: Half-day and full-day excursions in Nairobi and Mombasa

safaris.title: Nairobi City Tour
safaris.description: Take a guided tour of the city to visit the principal landmarks including Capitol Hill, National Museum with its paleontology hall, Snake Park, Railway Museum and City Market.

safaris.title: Karen Blixen, Giraffe Manor and Ostrich Park
safaris.description: Visit the home of former coffee farmer Karen Blixen, now preserved as a museum. Proceed to the Giraffe Manor where you can feed rare Rothschild giraffe. End the tour with a visit to the Ostrich Park.

safaris.title: Bomas of Kenya
safaris.description: Enjoy a cross-section of folk dances from various tribes in the country. Experience the culture as depicted by the recreated African villages with the chance to buy local handicrafts.

safaris.title: Nairobi National Park
safaris.description: Approximately 8 kilometers from the city centre, enter the Nairobi National Park to view lions, cheetahs, buffaloes, impala, giraffes and ostriches roaming in untouched savannah and indigenous forest.

safaris.title: Nairobi by Night
safaris.description: Dinner at a Brazilian style restaurant offering exotic grilled meat such as crocodile, zebra and chicken dishes, all roasted on a huge wood fire. Includes nightclub or casino visit.

safaris.title: Carnivore Experience
safaris.description: Guaranteed daily at 12.30pm and 7.00pm. Carnivore offers a variety of meat served in one meal including exotic and barbecue dishes.

safaris.title: Lake Naivasha and Crescent Island
safaris.description: Drive down the escarpment to Lake Naivasha. After a guided tour and buffet lunch beside the lake, enjoy a two-hour boat ride to Crescent Island to walk among plains game and birdlife.

safaris.title: Lake Nakuru National Park
safaris.description: Descend the escarpment into dramatic landscapes en route to Lake Nakuru, famous for flamingos and wildlife. Full park tour with lunch served inside the park.

safaris.title: Solio Ranch – Rhino
safaris.description: Drive through Kikuyu countryside to Outspan/Aberdare/Mt. Kenya Guest House. Next morning visit Solio Ranch, a unique sanctuary for black and white rhinos, lions, cheetahs and plains game. Picnic lunch included.

subcategories.title: Mombasa Excursions
subcategories.intro:
Mombasa is historical and the second largest city in Kenya with a population of 1 million. Lying on the Indian Ocean, it's a major sea port with an international airport. This is the centre of the coastal tourism industry. Mombasa city is a small Island separated from the main land by 2 creeks. The port serves both Kenya and neighboring land locked countries, linking them to the ocean.

Places of interest around Mombasa city:
a. Fort Jesus – overlooking the old port and built in 1593 to protect the port trade.
b. Bombolulu Workshops – founded by, and supporting the physically disabled.
c. Bamburi Nature Trails – Haller Park. Largest animal sanctuary in Mombasa.
d. The Mombasa Tusks – Built to commemorate Princess Margaret visit in 1956.
e. Mamba Village – Feed, feel and feed on crocodile delicacies.
f. Mombasa Marine Park.
g. Mombasa Old Town.
h. Rabai Museum – Christianity and modern learning built 1846 by missionaries.

safaris.title: 1 Day Mombasa City Tour
safaris.description: Take a guided city tour to visit principal landmarks including Akamba wood carving Village, a Hindu temple, Fort Jesus Museum, Old Town, Vegetable market and Biashara Street for shopping.

safaris.title: 1 Day Shimba Hills Tour
safaris.description: Situated 40 Kms from Mombasa drive past coconut, cashew nut and other plantations to Shimba Hills Reserve to view, amongst other animals, the rare sable and roan antelope. Lunch at a magnificent Lodge.

safaris.title: 1 Day Malindi and Gedi Ruins
safaris.description: Drive across the new Mtwapa and Kilifi bridges to visit the Gedi ruins. Continue to Malindi and view Marine life in a glass bottom boat at the Marine Park. After lunch in a local restaurant visit the snake farm and the falconry. En route to Mombasa have an optional stop at a local village.

safaris.title: Tamarind Dhow Dinner
safaris.description: A romantic Dhow Sundowner Cruise along the picturesque Island of Mombasa starts off an enchanting evening not to be missed. After docking at a private jetty, proceed to Fort Jesus for a sound-and-light presentation of the turbulent history of the East African Coast. A candle-lit dinner is served within the fortress by waiters in Portuguese attire.

safaris.title: 1 Day Tsavo National Park
safaris.description: Early morning drive 100 Km inland to Tsavo East National Park. Enter the park and start viewing game, stop at Aruba Dam en route to a lodge for lunch. After another game drive, return to Mombasa.

safaris.title: 2 Days Tsavo East
safaris.description: A two-day excursion to Tsavo East National Park including game drives and overnight accommodation at a safari lodge.

days.title: Arrival & First Game Drive
days.description: Morning drive to Bachuma Gate and enter Tsavo East Park, viewing game en route to Voi Safari Lodge / Sentrim / Ngulia / Aruba Ashnil for lunch.

days.title: Early Morning Game Drive
days.description: Early morning game drive. Relax and return to Mombasa after lunch.

safaris.title: 3 Days Tsavo East & West - Amboseli National Park
safaris.description: A three-day excursion to Tsavo East/West and Amboseli National Parks including game drives and overnight accommodation at safari lodges.

days.title: Drive to Tsavo East/West
days.description: Drive 100 Kms east to Tsavo East/West Park, home to the Red Elephant. Afternoon game drive and overnight at Ngulia / Kilaguni / Sentrim.

days.title: Amboseli National Park
days.description: Proceed to Amboseli Park for lunch at Kibo / Sentrim / Serena. Afternoon game drive with chances to see Mt Kilimanjaro.

days.title: Return to Mombasa
days.description: Early morning game drive, breakfast, then return to Mombasa.

safaris.title: Kiwayuu / Kipungani Islands (Upon Request)
safaris.description: A choice of two get-away-from-it-all beach hideaways. Both are small and intimate with personalized service and excellent cuisine. Access is by air only from Nairobi or Mombasa. Full board at Kiwayuu Lodge.

safaris.title: Lamu Island (Upon Request)
safaris.description: This is Kenya's oldest living town with little change in appearance and character. Access is by boat or via the airstrip in nearby Manda Island. Places of interest include Swahili House Museum, Lamu Fort, Donkey Sanctuary, The beach, Matondoni Village, Shela Village, and Dhow trips. Accommodation options upon request.

safaris.title: 3 Days Zanzibar Island (Upon Request)
safaris.description:
Day 1: Fly via Mombasa to Zanzibar. Afternoon spice tour visiting clove plantations.
Day 2: Morning tour of Stone Town including market, Sultan's Palace and Museum. Afternoon boat trip for swimming and snorkeling.
Day 3: Guided shopping trip before transfer to airport. Accommodation upon request.

days.title: Fly to Zanzibar
days.description: Fly via Mombasa to Zanzibar. Afternoon spice tour visiting clove plantations.

days.title: Stone Town Tour & Boat Trip
days.description: Morning tour of Stone Town including market, Sultan's Palace and Museum. Afternoon boat trip for swimming and snorkeling.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Guided shopping trip before transfer to airport. Accommodation upon request.

categories.title: Kenya Budget Safaris
categories.description: Budget and Adventure camping safaris in Kenya

safaris.title: AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - AMBOSELI: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms 4hrs]. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 AMBOSELI - NAIROBI: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop of wild animals. After breakfast return to Nairobi.

days.title: Drive to Amboseli
days.description: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms 4hrs]. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop of wild animals. After breakfast return to Nairobi.

safaris.title: THE HEMINGWAY TRAIL - MAASAI MARA
safaris.description: This three-day safari adventure begins with a scenic drive from Nairobi through the Great Rift Valley, stopping for lunch in Narok before arriving at the Maasai Mara Game Reserve in the late afternoon. The second day is dedicated entirely to exploring the reserve's famous grasslands, offering opportunities to view abundant wildlife such as black-maned lions, leopards, cheetahs, and elephants. On the final day, the tour departs after breakfast for the return journey to Nairobi, enjoying a picnic lunch en route and arriving back in the city in the late evening.

days.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
days.description: Drive south along the floor of the Great Rift Valley. Lunch at Narok and then climb the western wall entering the Hemingway country 'Serengeti Plains'. Arrive late afternoon at the Maasai Mara Game Reserve. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: A full day spent game viewing across the rich, tree-studded grasslands and rolling hills. The famous Mara is renowned for its great herds of plains games, black maned lion, leopard and cheetah. It also has numerous elephant, virtually every type of wildlife to be found in Kenya. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast, depart for Nairobi, enjoy a picnic lunch en-route and arrive in Nairobi late evening.

safaris.title: THE BORN FREE SAMBURU SAFARI
safaris.description: This three-day excursion heads north to the semi-desert region of Samburu, crossing the equator to reach a lodge surrounded by acacia woodland and natural springs. The second day features full-day game viewing along the riverbanks, where doum palms provide a scenic backdrop for spotting big game. The trip concludes on the third day with a departure after a hearty breakfast, returning to Nairobi before lunch.

days.title: Drive to Samburu
days.description: Early morning departure to the semi-desert north. Cross the equator, arriving at your lodge, where thorn bush gives way to acacia woodland and cascading springs. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: A full day spent game viewing along the banks of the river adorned with doum palms and attracting big game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: After a hearty breakfast, leave for Nairobi, arriving before lunch.

safaris.title: MAASAI MARA - NAKURU
safaris.description: This four-day safari starts with a drive from Nairobi to the Maasai Mara, featuring a picnic lunch and an afternoon game drive to spot the 'Big Five.' After a second day dedicated to exploring the vast plains of the Mara, the tour moves to Lake Nakuru via Narok on day three, arriving in time for a game drive in the famous bird sanctuary. The trip concludes on the fourth day with an early morning game drive and breakfast before returning to Nairobi in the afternoon.

days.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
days.description: Leave Nairobi for Maasai Mara Game Reserve, picnic en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed to the camp, in search of black maned lion, elephant, leopard, cheetah, buffalo and other plains game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: Full day spent exploring this unique park which really forms the northern part of the Serengeti National Park. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Drive to Nakuru
days.description: Depart after breakfast, have lunch in Narok town and later proceed to Lake Nakuru birds paradise arriving in good time for the afternoon game drive. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: Pre breakfast game drive, have breakfast and later depart for Nairobi in the afternoon.

safaris.title: MASAI MARA - LAKES NAKURU - BOGORIA - BARINGO
safaris.description: This six-day expedition begins with a journey through the Great Rift Valley to the Maasai Mara, where you will spend the first two days tracking diverse wildlife, including the Big Five. On day three, the tour travels toward Lake Nakuru, passing the scenic Lake Elementaita for panoramic views before an overnight stay in Nakuru. The fourth day moves further north to Lakes Bogoria and Baringo for an afternoon of exploring bird-rich habitats on foot, followed by a full fifth day in Baringo featuring a cliff-side bird walk, a boat ride on the freshwater lake, and cultural village visits. The safari concludes on day six with a return drive to Nairobi, arriving in the late afternoon.

days.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
days.description: Drive south along the floor of the Rift Valley. Lunch is served en route, then pass Narok, climb the western wall entering Hemingway country 'Serengeti Plains'. Arrive late afternoon in the Maasai Mara Game Reserve. Full board at the Camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: Full day spent in search of Elephants, Zebra, Wildebeest, Rhino, Buffalo, Lion, Cheetah, Leopard and other plains game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Drive to Nakuru
days.description: After breakfast, leave the camp for Lake Nakuru, picnic en-route at the Safari junction. After Lunch, proceed to Lake Nakuru via Lake Elementaita stopping for panoramic and scenery viewing. You will arrive in Nakuru later in the afternoon. Dinner and overnight in Nakuru.

days.title: Drive to Lakes Bogoria & Baringo
days.description: After an early pre morning game drive and breakfast, drive to Lake Baringo arriving in time for lunch, explore on foot this naturalist lakes and view birds in their thousands. Dinner and overnight in your hotel or camp.

days.title: Full Day at Lake Baringo
days.description: Full day in Baringo with a morning birds watching walk along the cliff walls. Lunch and afternoon boat ride in this fresh water lake and visit to traditional villages. Dinner and overnight at your Hotel or Camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast, return to Nairobi, arriving in the late afternoon.

safaris.title: MASAI MARA - LAKE NAKURU - AMBOSELI
safaris.description: This six-day safari kicks off with a drive from Nairobi to the Maasai Mara for an afternoon game drive, followed by a full second day exploring the reserve's abundant wildlife. On day three, the tour heads to Lake Nakuru National Park for a game drive focused on the 'Big Five' and its famous flamingo populations. The journey continues on day four to Amboseli National Park, where guests enjoy game drives against the iconic backdrop of Mt. Kilimanjaro, with a full fifth day dedicated to further exploration of the park. The adventure wraps up on day six with a final early morning game drive before returning to Nairobi in the late afternoon.

days.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
days.description: Leave Nairobi for Maasai Mara Game Reserve, picnic en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed for a game drive en route to the camp in search of black maned lion, elephant, leopard, cheetah, buffalo and other plains game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: Full day spent in search of Elephants, Zebra, Wildebeest, Rhino, Buffalo, Lion, Cheetah, Leopard and other plains game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Drive to Nakuru
days.description: After breakfast, leave the camp for Lake Nakuru, picnic en-route. After Lunch, proceed to Lake Nakuru stopping for panoramic and scenery viewing. You will arrive in Nakuru later in the afternoon. Dinner and overnight in Nakuru.

days.title: Drive to Amboseli
days.description: After an early pre morning game drive and breakfast, drive to Amboseli arriving in time for lunch, explore on foot this naturalist park and view big game under the backdrop of Mt. Kilimanjaro. Dinner and overnight in your camp.

days.title: Full Day at Amboseli
days.description: Full day in Amboseli with a morning and afternoon game drives. Dinner and overnight at your Camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast, return to Nairobi, arriving in the late afternoon.

safaris.title: 6 Days MASAI MARA - LAKE NAKURU - SAMBURU
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MASAI MARA: Leave Nairobi for Masai Mara Game Reserve, picnic lunch en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed for a game drive en route to the camp in search of black maned lions, elephant, cheetah, buffalo, and other plains game. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 MASAI MARA: Full day at Maasai Mara on a full board at the Camp. DAY 3 NAKURU: Early morning game drive and leave for Nakuru National Park. Lunch en route. Afternoon game drive in this park famous for the big five and a million plus flamingos. Full board at your hotel. DAY 4 SAMBURU: After breakfast, leave for Samburu. Picnic lunch en-route. Afternoon game drive in the park with the possibility of seeing the big cats. Full board at the camp. DAY 5 SAMBURU: Full day in Samburu on a full board basis at the Camp. DAY 6 SAMBURU - NAIROBI: Early morning game drive and leave for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving late in the afternoon.

days.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
days.description: Leave Nairobi for Masai Mara Game Reserve, picnic lunch en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed for a game drive en route to the camp in search of black maned lions, elephant, cheetah, buffalo, and other plains game. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day Game Drive
days.description: Full day at Maasai Mara on a full board at the Camp.

days.title: Drive to Nakuru
days.description: Early morning game drive and leave for Nakuru National Park. Lunch en route. Afternoon game drive in this park famous for the big five and a million plus flamingos. Full board at your hotel.

days.title: Drive to Samburu
days.description: After breakfast, leave for Samburu. Picnic lunch en-route. Afternoon game drive in the park with the possibility of seeing the big cats. Full board at the camp.

days.title: Full Day at Samburu
days.description: Full day in Samburu on a full board basis at the Camp.

days.title: Return to Nairobi
days.description: Early morning game drive and leave for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving late in the afternoon.

safaris.title: LAKE TURKANA SPECIAL SAFARI
safaris.description: This eight-day expedition ventures into Kenya's rugged northern frontier, starting with a drive from Nairobi to Lake Baringo via the Great Rift Valley. On day two, the journey climbs toward Maralal to encounter the nomadic Samburu people, followed by a spectacular day three trek across ancient lava flows to reach the 'Jade Sea' of Lake Turkana. Day four is spent at the Loiyangalani oasis, featuring a boat excursion to see crocodiles and a cultural visit to a Turkana Manyatta, before retracing the route back to Maralal on day five. The final leg of the safari transitions to the Samburu Game Reserve for two days of riverside game viewing along the Ewaso Ng'iro, ultimately returning to Nairobi on day eight with a stop in Nanyuki.

days.title: Nairobi/L. Baringo
days.description: Depart Nairobi in the morning stopping at the highest point of the Great Rift Valley. Lunch at Nakuru and arrive in L. Baringo in the late afternoon. Camp overnight at your campsite.

days.title: L. Baringo/Maralal
days.description: Climb out of the Rift Valley in the morning towards Maralal and the red ochred Samburu people still nomadic and proud. Full board at your campsite.

days.title: Maralal / Turkana
days.description: Break early in the morning for L. Turkana. Another spectacular climb leads you to Losiolo, descend down to Baragoi on your way to South Horr passing by a small stream; the rough road gets worse as we descend across ancient lava flows towards the Jade Sea and the Oasis Loiyangalani lying between the Lake and Mt. Kulal. Arrive in your permanent beach campsite soon after lunch and settle in the Turkana huts. Dinner and overnight in your campsite.

days.title: Turkana
days.description: Spend the day relaxing and bathing. A short boat excursion will follow to view crocodiles and other species of birds. You will also visit a Turkana Manyatta in the evening for traditional dances. Dinner and overnight in your camp.

days.title: Turkana/ Maralal
days.description: Drive up the Horr Valley back to Baragoi and proceed to camp in Maralal.

days.title: Maralal/Samburu
days.description: Drive to Samburu Game Reserve and settle by the canopy of trees in the Uaso Nyiro River campsite.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Morning and afternoon game runs in Samburu. Full board in your campsite.

days.title: Samburu/Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast drive back to Nairobi with lunch in Nanyuki. Drop off clients who wish to climb Mt. Kenya. Arrival in Nairobi is late in the evening.

safaris.title: TURKANA SCENIC SAFARI via CHALBI DESERT
safaris.description: This 8-day safari explores northern Kenya, starting in Nairobi and traveling through Samburu, Marsabit, Kalacha, Lake Turkana, and Maralal, before returning to Nairobi. The journey includes game drives in Samburu Game Reserve and Marsabit National Park, visits to unique natural features such as Lake Paradise, the Chalbi Desert, and Thompson Falls, and scenic drives past coffee and tea plantations with views of Mt. Kenya. Cultural highlights include visits to the Boran tribe's singing wells and the El Molo community on the shores of Lake Turkana. The itinerary balances wildlife viewing, cultural experiences, and leisure time, with full-board camping accommodations throughout the safari.

days.title: Nairobi/Samburu
days.description: Depart Nairobi in the morning for Samburu Game Reserve stopping in Nanyuki for lunch. You will pass through pleasant countryside with coffee and tea plantations providing a good view of Mt. Kenya. Game drive en route to your camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Morning and afternoon game run in Samburu. Full board at your campsite.

days.title: Samburu/Marsabit
days.description: Early morning pre-breakfast game drive. After breakfast drive to Marsabit via the 'singing wells' of the Boran tribe. Late lunch at the camp. The afternoon will be at leisure. Dinner and overnight at your campsite.

days.title: Marsabit/Kalacha
days.description: After breakfast proceed on a game drive in the nearby Marsabit National Park including a stop at Lake Paradise, a natural water hole in the park. Drive on to Kalacha with picnic lunch en route. Dinner and overnight in your campsite in this tiny settlement at the edge of the Chalbi desert.

days.title: Kalacha/L. Turkana
days.description: After breakfast depart Kalacha for Loiyangalani, the south-eastern shore of L. Turkana. The afternoon will be at leisure after lunch on arrival. Dinner and overnight in the campsite.

days.title: L. Turkana
days.description: A full day by the shore of L. Turkana during which you can visit the El Molo tribesmen in their village. The El Molo are said to be the smallest tribe in Africa numbering less than 100 people. All meals and overnight at your camp.

days.title: L. Turkana/Maralal
days.description: After breakfast depart Loiyangalani for Maralal town, via pristine landscape and scenery. Lunch will be served en route. Dinner and overnight in your campsite in Maralal.

days.title: Maralal/Nairobi (via Thompson Falls)
days.description: After breakfast depart for Nairobi via Thompson Falls with lunch en route. Arrive Nairobi in the early evening.

safaris.title: BEST OF KENYA LANDSCAPE TOUR
safaris.description: This 9-day safari explores western Kenya and the Rift Valley, starting and ending in Nairobi. The journey includes outdoor adventure, wildlife viewing, cultural experiences, and scenic landscapes. Highlights include trekking at Hell’s Gate National Park, visits to Kariandusi and Hyrax Hill prehistoric sites, and game drives in Lake Nakuru National Park. The safari continues through Lakes Bogoria and Baringo, the Cherangani Hills, and Saiwa Swamp, home to the rare Sitatunga antelope. Further exploration takes you to Mount Elgon, including a visit to the Kitum caves, and the biodiversity-rich Kakamega Forest. Cultural experiences include visiting the Tabaka soapstone carving center near Kisii. The safari concludes with extensive game drives in the Maasai Mara Game Reserve, including a full day with a picnic lunch, before returning to Nairobi.

days.title: Nairobi/Nakuru
days.description: Proceed to Hells Gate National Park for a morning of trekking inside the park. Proceed after lunch to Kariandusi prehistoric site and then on to Hyrax Hill prehistoric site. Overnight in Nakuru camp.

days.title: L. Nakuru/Bogoria/Baringo
days.description: Pre-breakfast game run in L. Nakuru National Park. After breakfast, proceed to camp in Lake Baringo for dinner and overnight.

days.title: L. Baringo/Saiwa Swamp
days.description: Baringo to Cherangani hills via Marigat. Here you will have a chance to see the rare Sitatunga antelope. Overnight in Saiwa Swamp or Kitale hotel.

days.title: Saiwa Swamp/ Mt Elgon
days.description: From Saiwa swamp via Kitale, we head to Mt Elgon, the second highest in Kenya arriving in time for lunch. Time allowing you will visit the Kiptum caves in Mt. Elgon. Dinner and overnight at the campsite or the Bandas.

days.title: Mt Elgon/Kakamega Forest
days.description: Proceed after breakfast to Kakamega forest via Webuye. Lunch en route. Afternoon visit of the Kakamega forest. Dinner and overnight in your campsite or Bandas.

days.title: Kakamega Forest/Kisii
days.description: After breakfast proceed to Kisii. Arrive in time for lunch in Kisii. In the afternoon visit a soapstone curving center at Tabaka area. Dinner and overnight in Kisii hotel.

days.title: Kisii/Maasai Mara
days.description: After breakfast drive to Maasai Mara via Kilgoris. Game runs en route to your campsite for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Full day in Maasai Mara Game Reserve with picnic lunch. Dinner and overnight in your campsite.

days.title: Maasai Mara/Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast drive out of the Reserve with game run en route. Picnic lunch will be served on your return to Nairobi. Arrival in Nairobi is in the afternoon.

categories.title: Kenya Luxury Safaris
categories.description: Premium safari experiences with luxury accommodations

safaris.title: Amboseli National Park
safaris.description: A 2-day Amboseli safari featuring scenic drives through Maasai land, wildlife game drives with views of Mount Kilimanjaro, overnight stay in Amboseli, and return to Nairobi after an early morning game drive.

days.title: Nairobi to Amboseli
days.description: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight.

days.title: Amboseli to Nairobi
days.description: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop for the wildlife. After breakfast return to Nairobi.

safaris.title: TREE HOTELS
safaris.description: A 2-day Aberdares safari with a scenic drive through central Kenya, lunch at Aberdare Country Club or Outspan, afternoon game viewing in Aberdares National Park, overnight at a tree hotel, and return to Nairobi the following morning.

days.title: Nairobi to Aberdares
days.description: Drive through Thika and pineapple plantations, cross Tana River and climb into Kikuyu farmlands. Arrive for lunch at Aberdare Country Club/Outspan. Afternoon game drive in Aberdares National Park visiting floodlit waterholes and saltlicks.

days.title: Aberdares to Nairobi
days.description: Morning descent to base hotel and return to Nairobi in time for lunch.

safaris.title: AMBOSELI - TSAVO - MOMBASA
safaris.description: A 3-day safari starting with game viewing in Amboseli beneath Mount Kilimanjaro, followed by exploration of Tsavo West including Mzima Springs, and ending with a scenic drive to Mombasa after breakfast.

days.title: Nairobi to Amboseli
days.description: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight.

days.title: Amboseli to Tsavo West
days.description: Cross Shetani Lava Flow to Tsavo West for game drive and overnight.

days.title: Tsavo West to Mombasa
days.description: After breakfast, drive to Mombasa, arrive for lunch.

safaris.title: MASAI MARA
safaris.description: A 3-day Masai Mara safari with arrival and game drive on Day 1, a full day of wildlife viewing on the Mara plains on Day 2, and return to Nairobi by midday on Day 3.

days.title: Nairobi to Masai Mara
days.description: Drive to the escarpment, descend into the Great Rift Valley to Narok. Enter Masai Mara for lunch, afternoon game drive, and overnight.

days.title: Masai Mara
days.description: Full day on the undulating hills and grasslands viewing antelopes, gazelles, lions, and other predators.

days.title: Masai Mara to Nairobi
days.description: Depart for Nairobi arriving before lunch.

safaris.title: THE BORN FREE SAFARI SAMBURU
safaris.description: A 3-day Born Free Safari in Samburu featuring an early morning departure from Nairobi, game viewing along the riverbanks on Day 2, and return to Nairobi on Day 3 after breakfast.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Early morning departure to the semi-desert north, arriving at Shaba Lodge after crossing the equator [352 kms, 5 1/2 hrs]

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Full day game viewing along the riverbanks.

days.title: Samburu/Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi, arriving before lunch. Full board accommodations at Ashnil/Simba or Sarova Shaba or Simba Lodges.

safaris.title: LAKE NAKURU - LAKE NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Lake Nakuru, Lake Naivasha, Masai Mara
safaris.description: A 4-day safari visiting Lake Nakuru for flamingos and rhinos, Lake Naivasha for a boat ride among hippos and birds, and Masai Mara for abundant wildlife viewing, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Nairobi to Lake Nakuru
days.description: Drive through tea and coffee plantations near Limuru, arrive at Lake Nakuru Park. Afternoon game drive, overnight at lodge.

days.title: Lake Nakuru to Masai Mara
days.description: Morning drive past Mt. Longonot, arrive at Maasai Mara for afternoon game drive and overnight.

days.title: Masai Mara
days.description: Full day of game drive in the reserve.

days.title: Masai Mara to Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi before lunch.

safaris.title: AMBOSELI - TSAVO - TAITA HILLS
safaris.description: A 4-day safari starting with game viewing in Amboseli beneath Mount Kilimanjaro, followed by exploration of Tsavo West including Mzima Springs, and ending with a scenic drive to Mombasa via Taita Hills after breakfast.

days.title: Nairobi to Amboseli
days.description: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms, 4 hrs].

days.title: Amboseli to Tsavo West
days.description: Cross Shetani Lava Flow to Tsavo West for game drive and overnight [105 kms, 2 hrs].

days.title: Tsavo West to Taita Hills
days.description: Drive to Taita Hills for game drive and overnight [90 kms, 1.5 hrs].

days.title: Taita Hills to Mombasa
days.description: After breakfast, drive to Mombasa, arrive for lunch.

safaris.title: TREE HOTEL-SAMBURU-MT KENYA
safaris.description: A 5-day safari starting with a scenic drive to Aberdares and overnight at a tree hotel, followed by game viewing in Samburu, a visit to the cool slopes of Mt. Kenya, and return to Nairobi after breakfast on Day 5.

days.title: Tree Hotel
days.description: Morning drive through Kikuyu farmlands, afternoon game drive in Aberdares, overnight at base hotel [160 kms, 3 hrs].

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Drive north to Samburu, afternoon game drive at Shaba Lodge [207 kms, 3.5 hrs].

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Full day game viewing including rarer northern species.

days.title: Mt Kenya
days.description: Travel to cool slopes of Mt Kenya, overnight at Nanyuki lodge [137 kms, 0.5 hrs].

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Depart for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving by lunch [215 kms, 3 hrs].

safaris.title: AMBOSELI - LAKE NAIVASHA - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Amboseli, Lake Naivasha, Nakuru, Masai Mara
safaris.description: A 6-day safari starting with game viewing in Amboseli beneath Mount Kilimanjaro, followed by visits to Lake Naivasha and Lake Nakuru for bird watching and rhino viewing, and ending with abundant wildlife viewing in Masai Mara, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Amboseli
days.description: Drive south through Maasai country, afternoon game viewing beneath Kilimanjaro.

days.title: Amboseli
days.description: Dawn drive, leisure morning, afternoon game drive.

days.title: Lake Naivasha
days.description: Drive to Lake Naivasha with lunch enroute, afternoon at leisure.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Depart early, lunch at lodge, afternoon game drive.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Full day game viewing of black-maned lions and leopards.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Kibo/Kilima Amboseli, Pelican/Sentrim Naivasha, and Sentrim/Ol Moran/Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: SAMBURU - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.description: A 6-day safari starting with game viewing in Samburu, followed by visits to Lake Nakuru for bird watching and rhino viewing, and ending with abundant wildlife viewing in Masai Mara, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Morning drive through rolling agricultural land round Nyeri, cross the equator, arrive at Samburu lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [352 kms, 0.5 hrs].

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Full day viewing elephants, lions, Gerenuk, Beisa Oryx, and crocodiles.

days.title: Nakuru
days.description: Drive through Aberdares to Nakuru Park, lunch and game drive, overnight [315 kms, 5 hrs].

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Continue across the valley to Maasai Mara, lunch, afternoon game drive [315 kms, 5 hrs].

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Full day game drive with photography opportunities of black-maned lions, cheetah, and leopard.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Sopa Samburu, Sentrim/Flamingo Nakuru, Sentrim/Ol Moran or Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: TREE HOTEL - SAMBURU - NAKURU & NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Tree Hotel, Samburu, Nakuru, Naivasha, Masai Mara
safaris.description: A 6-day safari starting with a scenic drive to Aberdares and overnight at a tree hotel, followed by game viewing in Samburu, visits to Lake Nakuru and Lake Naivasha, and ending with abundant wildlife viewing in Masai Mara, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Nairobi - Tree Hotel
days.description: Drive through Kikuyu farmlands to Nyeri, lunch, afternoon game drive in Aberdares, overnight at base hotel.

days.title: Tree Hotel - Samburu
days.description: Descend into semi-desert Samburu, afternoon game drive, overnight at lodge.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Full day exploring Samburu Reserve.

days.title: Samburu - Lake Nakuru/Lake Naivasha
days.description: Drive to Lake Nakuru with a stop at Thompson Falls, lunch, visit bird sanctuary, overnight at hotel or camp at Nakuru/Naivasha.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Early departure, lunch at lodge, afternoon game drive in Mara, overnight at lodge or tented camp.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi after breakfast.

safaris.title: MASAI MARA / LAKES NAKURU / BOGORIA / BARINGO
safaris.description: A 6-day safari starting with abundant wildlife viewing in Masai Mara, followed by visits to Lake Nakuru for bird watching and rhino viewing, Lake Bogoria for flamingos and hot springs, and ending with exploration of Lake Baringo, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Nairobi - Masai Mara
days.description: Drive along the Rift Valley floor, lunch en route, arrive late afternoon at Maasai Mara.

days.title: Masai Mara
days.description: Full day searching for elephants, zebra, wildebeest, rhino, buffalo, lion, cheetah, leopard, overnight at base camp.

days.title: Masai Mara
days.description: Full day game viewing with picnic lunch, overnight at camp.

days.title: Masai Mara - Nakuru
days.description: Depart for Lake Nakuru, picnic lunch at Safari Junction, visit Lake Elementaita, overnight at Nakuru hotel.

days.title: Lakes Nakuru - Bogoria - Baringo
days.description: Drive to Lake Baringo via Lake Bogoria, picnic lunch, explore on foot, view flamingos, overnight at Baringo hotel or camp.

days.title: Lake Nakuru - Nairobi
days.description: Early morning game drive at Lake Nakuru, return to Nairobi after breakfast.

safaris.title: TREE HOTEL - SAMBURU - MT. KENYA - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Tree Hotel, Samburu, Mt Kenya, Nakuru, Masai Mara
safaris.description: An 8-day safari starting with a scenic drive to Aberdares and overnight at a tree hotel, followed by game viewing in Samburu, a visit to the cool slopes of Mt. Kenya, Lake Nakuru for bird watching and rhino viewing, and ending with abundant wildlife viewing in Masai Mara, with scenic drives and game drives throughout.

days.title: Tree Hotel
days.description: Drive north to Kenya's Central Highlands arriving in time for lunch at Aberdare National Park. After lunch at the base hotel, proceed for game watching and overnight [160 kms 3hrs].

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Drive across equator to Samburu, lunch at Shaba Lodge, drive along Uaso Nyiro river, overnight [207 kms, 3.5 hrs].

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Full day game viewing in rugged terrain.

days.title: Mt Kenya
days.description: Drive south to Nanyuki, overnight at lodge [137 kms, 2.5 hrs].

days.title: Nakuru
days.description: Drive west across Aberdares to Lake Nakuru, lunch and game drive, overnight [137 kms, 2.5 hrs].

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Travel across Rift Valley to Masai Mara, afternoon game drive, overnight [315 kms, 3.5 hrs].

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Full day of wildlife viewing.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Return to Nairobi after breakfast, arriving at lunch [280 kms, 4.5 hrs].

categories.title: Extreme Challenge Adventure Safaris
categories.description: Premium safari experiences with luxury accommodations

safaris.title: Rock Climbing & Hiking Challenge
safaris.destination: Hell's Gate National Park, Mt Longonot, Lake Naivasha
safaris.description: A three days' rock climbing and hiking adventure safari in Kenya's Rift Valley. Experience the thrill of rock climbing in Hellsgate National park, hike Mt Longonot crater and cycle amongst wildlife in Hellsgate National park.

days.title: Arrival & First Game Drive
days.description: Depart Nairobi to Lake Naivasha arriving in time for lunch. After lunch at the camp proceed for afternoon challenge and cycle amoungst wildlife at Hellsgate National park . Dinner and overnight at Carnellis camp or Fishermans camp.

days.title: Naivasha
days.description: Rock climb Hellsgate National park including Both the Fischers and Central towers. Also visit Jorowa Gorges and Hells Kitchen. In the afternoon, have a boat ride among the hippos in Lake Naivasha. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Depart after early breakfast and hike Mt Longonot crater( 2700 mtrs high) in the morning. After lunch depart for Nairobi.

safaris.title: Laikipia Adventure Safari
safaris.description: A four days' adventure safari on Laikipia plateau involving game drives, cycling, trekking and canopy walk in Mt Kenya forest.

days.title: Olpejeta Conservancy.
days.description: Depart Nairobi and drive north to Ol Pajeta conservancy arriving in time for lunch in this game reserve that cuts the equator both to the North and South. Afternoon game drive in 4x4 vehicles in  search of the big five. Dinner and overnight at Ol Pajeta camp.

days.title: Rift Valley Adventures
days.description: Full day cycling and biking around Mt Kenya. Dinner and overnight at Rift Valley Adventures camp.

days.title: Ngare Ndare Forest Canopy
days.description: Full day trekking at this Natural equatorial forest with Canopy walk. Dinner and overnight at Nanyuki camp.

days.title: Departure
days.description: After breakfast return to Nairobi with picnic lunch enroute.

safaris.title: Sagana White Water Rafting & Kayaking
safaris.description: Three days of white water rafting and kayaking adventure safari in Sagana, central Kenya along the Tana River.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: Depart Nairobi to central Kenya at the slopes of Mt Kenya to Sagana town, the headquarters of water rafting in Kenya at The Tana River. Arrive in time for lunch. Afternoon rafting in the biggest river in Kenya. Dinner and overnight at Savage Camp.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: In the morning after breakfast, do Water sport Kayaking and in the afternoon do Rock climbing. Have a sundowner dinner on the banks of this mighty river. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: Sagana
days.description: In the morning proceed for Mt Biking between 20 km – 40 kms. In the afternoon, engage in a stand-up paddle board for 2 hrs. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

safaris.title: Biking at Maasai Mara
safaris.description: Five days biking adventure safari in Maasai Mara National Reserve involving game drives and biking among wildlife.

days.title: 70Km Cycle Ride
days.description: Drive from Nairobi to corner baridi on th outskirts of the city then cycle for 70 kms free fall down hill towards Masai Mara Game reserve. Dinner and overnight at a camp.

days.title: 40Km Cycle Ride among Wildlife
days.description: Cycle for 40 Kms amoungst wildlife in Maasai Mara National reserve. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: 8Km Cycle Ride & 4x4 Transfer
days.description: This day we only cycle for 8 Kms due to the difficult terrains then picked by 4x4 to our camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: 50Km Cycle Ride
days.description: Cycle for further 50 Kms in this wonderful scenic Maasai people countyside with beautiful landscapes. Dinner and overnight at a camp.

days.title: Departure
days.description: After breakfast Return to Nairobi by Vehicle.

safaris.title: Tri Adventure Challenge
safaris.description: Ten days tri adventure challenge safari involving hiking Mt Kenya, biking from Mt Kenya to Ol Pajeta conservancy and white water rafting and other water sports in Sagana.

days.title: Nairobi - Chogoria
days.description: Drive from Nairobi to Chogoria town 4 hrs and proceed  to the Chogoria Forest gate for Lunch. In the afternoon, hike from the gate to Bush Clearing 2600 m. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: Hike to Lake Ellis
days.description: Hike from Bush Clearing to Lake Ellis 3200m where prince William was engaged. Dinner and overnight at a camp.

days.title: Hike to Mintos Hut
days.description: Hike from Lake ellis to Mintos Hut. In the afternoon Visit the temple.

days.title: Summit Day
days.description: Summit Morning from 2 am to Summit point Lenana 4895m and down to old Moses camp.

days.title: Biking to Ol Pajeta Conservancy
days.description: Biking from Old Moses camp to Ol Pajeta Conservancy or Rift Valley Adventures Camp approximately 70 Kms.

days.title: Biking to Savange Camp Sagana
days.description: Biking for approximately 50 Kms to Mweiga township where you are picked by vehicle and drive to Savange Camp Sagana on the banks of river Tana. Dinner and overnight at the Camp.

days.title: White Water Rafting
days.description: White water rafting in the morning followed by afternoon at leisure.

days.title: Rock Climbing & Kayaking
days.description: Water sport Kayaking in the morning. In the afternoon Do Rock Climbing followed by a Sun Downer dinner.

days.title: Mountain Biking & Paddle Boarding
days.description: Mt Biking for between 20 and 40 Kms in the morning followed in the afternoon by Stand up paddle board for 2 hrs.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Return to Nairobi or Relax.

safaris.title: Explore The Great Rift Valley
safaris.description: Eleven days adventure safari exploring the Great Rift Valley involving game drives, hiking, biking and bird watching.

days.title: Nairobi - Samburu
days.description: Drive from Nairobi to Umoja Camp in Samburu having lunch enroute.  Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: Game Drive to Samburu
days.description: Morning and Afternoon game drives in Samburu Game Reserve. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

days.title: Hike to Loldukokwe Centre
days.description: Drive from Archers post to Wamba Junction, then cycle for about 40 Kms to Loldukokwe Centre deep in the rift valley. Later after lunch picked by vehicle to Maralal Yare Camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: 20Km Cycle to Mararal
days.description: Cycle for 20 Kms to Mararal town and back. This afternoon is spent interacting with the Samburu Normadic tribesmen.

days.title: Drive to Poror
days.description: Drive to Poror, The great Rift valley view point, Visit a Samburu traditional villages commonly referred to as Manyattas and back to camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Drive to Mararal
days.description: Drive from Mararal to Lake Baringo at Roberts Camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Bird watching and Cycling
days.description: Drive from Kambi Samaki to Loruk township. From Here cycle for about 40 Kms in this scenic rift valley inhabited by the Pokot tribesmen. Afternoon spent doing  a Bird viewing walk in this area with over 600 species of birds. Dinner and overnight at Roberts camp.

days.title: Drive to Lake Naivasha
days.description: Drive from Lake Baringo to Lake Naivasha at Fishermans Camp, having lunch enroute.

days.title: Biking and Boat Ride
days.description: Morning spent Biking Hellsgate National Park and in the Afternoon have a boat ride to see different animals and birds at the crescent island.

days.title: Full day Hiking Mt Longonot
days.description: Full day hiking Mt Longonot  2700 m with meals at the camp.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Drive back to Nairobi.

categories.title: Safaris Across East Africa
categories.description: Explore Kenya and its neighboring countries

safaris.title: KENYA / TANZANIA SAFARI
safaris.description: A comprehensive safari exploring the best of Kenya and Tanzania including Amboseli, Samburu, Lake Nakuru, Nairobi, Lake Manyara, Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater.

days.title: Tree Hotel
days.description: Morning drive to the forested highlands of the Aberdares. After lunch at the base hotel, transfer to your tree hotel for game watching at the floodlit water hole.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Continue north across the equator to the home of the samburu people. Marvel at the rugged scenery of isolated crags and springs in this semi arid region. After a game drive, relax in the comfort of your lodge.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Morning and later afternoon, game drives along the Uaso Nyiro river. In addition to the carnivores, view the rare species of herbivores such as the Beisa oryx or the Grevy zebra.

days.title: Nakuru
days.description: The drive to lake Nakuru provides stunning vistas between the escarpments of the Rift Valley. During the game drive, behold the amazing sight of candy pink flamingoes lining the waters of the alkaline lake.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast, depart for Nairobi, arriving before lunch. Afternoon at your leisure.

days.title: Lake Manyara
days.description: Cross the border to Tanzania at Namanga, stopping at Arusha for Lunch. Proceed to Lake Manyara for a game drive. Spend the night at the Lake Manyara Hotel.

days.title: Serengeti
days.description: Morning game drive reveals the famous tree climbing lions which spend most of the day along branches of acacia trees. After lunch, proceed to Serengeti Park for the night.

days.title: Serengeti
days.description: Experience an exciting spectacle of the astounding concentrations of game and extensive bird life at home on the Serengeti plains.

days.title: Ngorongoro
days.description: After a morning game drive in the Serengeti, continue to the 'cradle of Mankind' at Olduvai Gorge. Proceed to Ngorongoro for the night.

days.title: Ngorongoro
days.description: During the days game drives, discover this legendary crater containing the greatest permanent concentration of wildlife in Africa.

days.title: return to Nairobi
days.description: Stopping at Arusha for Lunch, return to Nairobi via Namanga.

categories.title: Kenya Flying Safaris
categories.description: Experience Kenya's wildlife from the air

safaris.title: Maasai Mara
safaris.description: A three days flying safari exploring the best of Kenya's wildlife destinations including Maasai Mara National Reserve.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Transfer from Nairobi Hotel to Wilson airport for a 45 minute flight to Masai Mara game reserve. On arrival, transfer directly to a lodge or luxury tented camp where there will be a little time to relax before lunch. Later in the afternoon, game viewing with an expert driver or guide to look for the '  Big Five'

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Rise at dawn for early morning game viewing followed by a well-earned breakfast. Further,  game viewing during the morning.  After lunch, take time for a siesta before an afternoon game drive.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: Early morning game viewing and a last chance to look for any animals not yet seen. Later in the morning transfer to the airstrip for the flight back to Nairobi and onward transfer to hotel.

safaris.title: Amboseli
safaris.description: A two days flying safari exploring Amboseli National Park.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: Early morning transfer from Nairobi hotel to Wilson for the flight to Amboseli National Park. Weather permitting birds-eye view of the sow capped peak of Mt Kilimanjaro will be a first introduction to this existing Wildlife haven. Game viewing before and after lunch may reveal Lion, Elephant, Buffalo, Giraffe and a host of other plains animals. Dinner and overnight at a Lodge or at a Luxury tented Camp.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast return flight back to Nairobi hotel.

days.title: Maasai Mara
days.description: An early morning transfer to Mombasa airport for the direct flight to the fabled Masai Mara game reserve. there will time to relax and take in the magnificent landscapes before a delicious buffet lunch at the lodge. Afternoon game viewing by four-wheel drive land cruiser may reveal the 'Big Five' or even the elusive cheetah.  Full board at Lodge or a luxury tented camp.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: After breakfast return flight back to Nairobi hotel.

safaris.title: Samburu
safaris.description: A three days flying safari exploring Samburu National Reserve.

days.title: Lake Nakuru
days.description: Transfer from Nairobi hotel to Wilson airport for the flight to Samburu National Reserve. From the air, the Kikuyu farmlands can be seen as a fascinating patchwork quilt stretching 100 miles and culminating in the twin peaks of the snow-capped Mt Kenya. Beyond the mountain lies Samburu and your lodge or luxury camp on the banks of Uaso Ngiro river. After lunch a game viewing drive along the river.

days.title: Samburu
days.description: Morning and afternoon game viewing. Samburu is home to many uncommon species such as the Reticulated Giraffe, Grevy Zebra, Oryx and the long-necked Gerenuk. In addition, Elephant, Lion, Leopard, and Crocodile can be seen. Full board and overnight at your lodge or Luxury Tented Camp.

days.title: Nairobi
days.description: An early morning game drive. After breakfast return to Nairobi by air and onward transfer to hotel.

safaris.title: Lamu
safaris.description: Fly from Nairobi directly to Lamu island and stay for 2 or more nights. Spend the time exploring the old town of Lamu, relax on the beach or walk across the island to some of the villages such as Matondoni where the dhows are still built by hand. Overnight at a hotel in Lamu. Tours and excursions on Lamu may also be pre-booked at supplementary cost.

days.title: Lamu
days.description: Afternoon transfer from your beach hotel to Mombasa or Malindi airport for the short flight to Manda Island. Transfer by boat to Lamu island. Later in the evening enjoy a guided tour of Lamu town, and finally there will be time to relax by the beach or swim in the crystal-clear water before the return flight to Malindi or Mombasa and an onward transfer to beach hotel.

days.title: Early Morning Game Drive
days.description: Rise at dawn for early morning game viewing followed by a well-earned breakfast. Further,  game viewing during the morning.  After lunch, take time for a siesta before an afternoon game drive.

safaris.title: Amboseli
safaris.description: Transfer from your beach hotel to Mombasa Airport. It is about an hours flight directly to Amboseli. Weather permitting , enjoy fine views of Mt Kilimanjaro as the aircraft comes in to land. Morning and afternoon game viewing in the park with lunch at one of the lodges. Fly back to Mombasa late afternoon and onward transfer to your beach hotel.

categories.title: Kenya Cultural Experience and Sports Safaris
categories.description: Explore Kenya's rich cultural heritage and enjoy various sports activities

safaris.title: Walking Safari
safaris.description: Walking Safari itinerary is organized according the client's request.

safaris.title: Camel Ride Safari
safaris.description: 5 nights 6-day trip through the wild and beautiful country just north of Mt. Kenya is an adventure in the true pioneering spirit and a tantalizing taste of Africa in the raw. The pace is leisurely, riding or walking with the camels during the morning. After picnic lunch there's time to relax or take a game viewing walk later in the afternoon. At the end of the day, there are welcome showers followed by dinner round the campfire. Accommodation at base camp is under canvas, while on safari, beds are provided under the stars. No riding skills are required as the camels are usually led, although a certain amount of walking is necessary. Start from Nairobi or the camel safari may be included as part of a longer safari.

safaris.title: The Lunatic Express
safaris.description: The Lunatic Express is a journey by train from Nairobi to Mombasa along the historic Uganda Railway, built between 1896 and 1901. The railway was dubbed the 'Lunatic Express' because of the enormous cost in lives and money to build it through some of the most inhospitable country on earth. Today, the train journey is a fascinating experience, passing through small towns and villages, over impressive viaducts and through tunnels. The train has several classes of travel, from basic second class to first class with air-conditioned carriages and sleeper berths. Meals are served in the dining car, and there is a bar car for drinks and snacks. The journey takes about 12 hours, and it is possible to break the journey with overnight stops at various points along the route.

safaris.title: Lake Victoria Fishing Safari
safaris.description: This trip operates from Masai Mara. Lake Victoria, the world's second largest freshwater lake, is notable for its huge Nile Perch. Depart by light from from the Mara either at dawn or after breakfast. The fishing base is on Rusinga or Mfangano islands. The day is spent fishing by boat with breakfast, lunch, soft drinks and beer provided. Return to your Mara lodge or camp during the afternoon. Visitors may also stay overnight and extend the safari as desired.

safaris.title: Horse Riding Safari
safaris.description: Horse riding safaris are available in several parts of Kenya including the Masai Mara, Laikipia and Mount Kenya regions. These safaris offer a unique way to explore the diverse landscapes and wildlife of Kenya while enjoying the companionship of horses. Riders can expect to see a variety of wildlife including zebras, giraffes, antelopes, and sometimes even predators like lions and cheetahs from a safe distance. The pace of the safari can be adjusted to suit the riders' experience levels, with options for leisurely rides or more challenging treks.

safaris.title: Sports Safaris
safaris.description: Sports safaris in Kenya offer an exciting blend of adventure, endurance, and unique sporting experiences set against the country's spectacular natural landscapes. These safaris include mountain biking along the scenic slopes of Mount Kenya, participation in the annual Kenya Open Golf Tournament, and the renowned Lewa Marathon, where runners share the terrain with wildlife in a truly unforgettable test of stamina. Thrill-seekers can take part in the legendary Rhino Charge, an intense off-road 4x4 challenge involving extreme terrain such as cliffs, swamps, and rugged wilderness. Kenya also hosts the globally celebrated Safaricom Sevens rugby tournament, reflecting the country's strong international rugby standing, as well as the International Camel Derby held in Maralal, offering a distinctive sporting spectacle in the dry, sun-soaked landscapes of northern Kenya.

safaris.title: Water Sports Safari
safaris.description: The waters of Kenya's coast is the main setting for water sports such as windsurfing, water skating, snorkeling, scuba diving, rowing, dhow safaris and deep sea fishing just beyond the coral reef viewing expeditions on request.

safaris.title: Cruise Ships
safaris.description: Mombasa is fast emerging as an important cruise ship centre. Flying safaris to distant wildlife parks and road safaris to distant wildlife parks and road safaris to the nearby parks of Tsavo and Amboseli are easily arranged. Day safaris to Lamu archipelago and deep sea fishing expeditions are also arranged for the cruise ship passengers. Mombasa is also the base to home ported cruise ships which offer services within the Indian Ocean cruise circuit.

safaris.title: Wedding Safari
safaris.description: Many newly-weds have enjoyed a romantic honeymoon in Kenya, but why not go the whole hog and get married there too? We can make all the arrangements in advance for the ceremony and any additional extras such as photographer, wedding cake, bouquet or other celebrations. Weddings can take place at many of the beach hotels or other exotic locations by special arrangement.

safaris.title: Conference Safari
safaris.description: What could be a better and more fulfilling experience than holding your next business conference or seminar in a setting that is exactly right and which has everything it takes to organize a successful conference or seminar. Kenya is arguably the answer to this basic question.

safaris.title: Farm and Ranch Safari
safaris.description: Why not stay on one of Kenya's farms or ranches where wildlife often co-exists with domestic stock. Accommodation is in comfortable farm houses or log cabins with meals provided. Guests are usually hosted by the farm owners who also offer escorted walks, horse riding, game drives or guided tours of the working farm.

Self-drive or chauffer driven car is available from Nairobi or Mombasa. In addition to the normal range of car categories, we can offer Suzuki (2 seat) and Land cruiser (4-5 seat) 4-wheel drive vehicles. We can also offer one-way rental between Nairobi and Mombasa or vice-versa. Accommodation for self-drive itineraries may be pre-booked through our offices.
